entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 7 May 2023
